name: Linda Thompson
biography: Linda Thompson is currently Creative Director at INNOVASIA. She began as a textiles specialist at Knoll Textiles. She trained under Knoll Textiles’ Design Director, Barbara Rhodes-Segerer. In 1978, former president of Knoll International invited her to become director of a new company, which she would found and build; it was called Sunar Textiles. In 1987, Sunar merged with EF Hauserman, and Thompson became Vice President of Marketing and Design, forming Pallas Textiles as a subsidiary of KI Furniture. She became tremendously successful, winning awards for her upholstery, wall covering, and healthcare designs. In 2001, Thompson established her own design consulting firm offering color, textiles and interior design throughout the world.
